item.description:
Join me this Saturday: VISION BOARDS are great for helping us see our potential and believe attaining it is possible. Yet we need to go deeper, and EMBRACE WHO WE NEED TO BE to manifest OUR vision and CLEAR SUBCONSCIOUS limiting beliefs that block the full expression of our highest selves. Click below to RSVP, AJP

IMAGINE GREATNESS....Yes, we will teach you how to EXPAND into greater love, joy, abundance and success...with a grou ... p of like-minded others committed to living life larger, with support, care, kindness and expertise...and using the latest in brain science.

Be on the leading edge, with us, as we help you dream and live bigger.

Facilitated by:
Sifu (Teacher) Anthony Pasquale
(Master Instructor/Mindful Wealth Leader)
ajpenterprise@msn.com

COME JOIN US as we elevate you to new standards of success never before attained--personally, professionally and financially.

At this seminar you will learn how to….
*Release internal blocks
*Integrate healthy new beliefs
*Create a Vision
*Create The Vision Board
*Bond with others committed to personal growth & success

Inner Belief Boot Camp Series
Ideal Business Center
20 Locust Street, Danvers, MA

$35.00 here through PayPal, $50.00 at the door.   If you bring someone it is 25.00 pp EACH!!! Including you, WOW 1/2 off!   To register or to learn more details, please call:
1-800-820-7632
item.how_to_find_us: Ready to Teach you how to have the BEST LIFE EVER!

group.name: Danvers " The Secret "Vision Board Workshop Meetup

item.name: Your Vision to Greatness, Through Greatness! Create Your Vision Board!
